item.title: Browse and Search Liked Tweets using R
item.description: The other day, I was scrolling through my “liked” Tweets and got maybe 100 deep when I accidentally clicked a hyperlink and had to restart scrolling from the beginning. The experience made me so frustrated that I started looking up easier ways of perusing one’s likes. I found this tutorial that walked through how to pull liked Tweets into a CSV using Python - so I decided to give it a shot using R.
